reviewText:
"What's New Scooby-Doo, Volume 8: Zoinks! Camera! Action!" contains the best, greatest, funniest, and most mysterious episodes of the entire television series. Good thing that there'll all together on this DVD. The following are the episodes featured on this DVD, and a short description of them. The episode's monster are written in CAPITAL LETTERS within the episode description.

1.  Lights! Camera! Mayhem! -- THE FACELESS PHAMTOM is trying to sabotage a movie in Hollywood.
2.  E-Scream -- VIRTUAL REALITY CREATURES are coming to life at a video game convention.
3.  Simple Plan and the Invisible Madman -- An INVISIBLE MADMAN is trying ot ruin Simple Plan's concert.
4.  A Scooby-Doo Valentine -- The gang are blamed for a crime that their CLONES commited!

Overall, these are great episodes.....better than the original Scooby-Doo television series. I think that all the episodes deserve an A+++++.  If you're new to the "What's New Scooby-Doo" series (or ANY Scooby-Doo series), buy this volume. You will not regret at all, because the mysteries are not obvious. These four fantastic episodes are family fun for everyone. (Plus, the Special Features are fun). Buy it!!! It's a good thing you can put in English, Spanish, or French - that anyone can enjoy this! ^_^
The episodes are great but the E-Scream episode is defective.  I tried 2 different DVD's and both of them skip during this episode.
I've always been a big fan of Scooby-Doo Always will be
it was requested from me as a Christmas gift for my grandson. He loved it and the whole family enjoyed it together. It was a hit.
this is a awesome collection of Scooby-Doo. it is fun and enjoyable to watch. if you have not seen this dvd then i recommend you do

This volume is better than the others.
here are the episodes
1. Lights camera mayhem- The gang is being chased by the ghost of rip bannon away from the studio in hollywood ( a+)
2. E-scream- The gang is being chased by virtual creatures at a video game convention ( c-)
3. Simple plan and the invisible madman- The gang is heading to simple plan's concert, but an invisible madman hijacks the bus and simple plan helps the gang solve the mystery. ( a+)
4. Scooby Doo valentine- The gang is being frammed for "secret admirers" crimes( a+)

All of these episodes are some of the best except for e-sream

Needed to replace my sons VHS tapes so he could travel with his favorite shows; so needed to be able to find them quickly and at a great price, in good shape and that is way I went to Amazon who is linked to many companies and have new and used at different price tags, one stop shopping and the descriptions are spot on, so am not disappointed when the product gets here.
I have always loved Scooby Doo and so have my kids.  My pre-teen daughter bought this DVD specifically because it contains an episode with cartoon characters of the band, Simple Plan.
I am a Scooby Doo fanatic and very satisfied with this movie. The price, service, and delivery time was excellent too!
our whole family loves scoody doo and we are trying to get all the dvds made of him...this is such a neat dvd and the cats love him too.  thanks
My kids are 5 and 7 and are very into Scooby Doo right now.  They love it!  However, they haven't seen a Scooby Doo they didn't like.
